text: Breaking News: The Federal Reserve announced a 0.25% interest rate hike today to combat inflation. Markets reacted with volatility.
UPDATE: Fed raises rates by 25 basis points. Jerome Powell emphasized the need to stabilize prices. Stocks fluctuated in early trading.
SpaceX successfully launched the Starship rocket from Boca Chica, Texas. This marks a major milestone for Mars exploration.
Starship launch successful! Elon Musk's company achieved orbit with the massive booster. A giant leap for interplanetary travel.
The local weather forecast for Seattle predicts heavy rain throughout the weekend with temperatures dropping to 45F.
